sentence.text: As mentioned earlier , there is some connection between temperament and factors such as build , colour , breed etc .
As already mentioned , choosing patio doors that suit your house is one of the most important points to consider .
The problem of induction can not be regarded as a decisive refutation because , as I have previously mentioned , most other philosophies of science suffer from a similar difficulty .
` I 've got a big stick , " mentioned Punch confidingly to his audience , as Judy appeared with her baby .
` He mentioned in passing that you had a lot of female visitors , that 's all .
I mentioned in my last letter to Fiona that Lord Lovat had been badly wounded during an attack on the enemy positions on the evening of 12th June .
At the same time Linkworth mentioned to everyone how he was making money from his little shop .
I mentioned to Kirk that I had no intention of asking him about that part of the tour .
Working as a pageboy in a club in St James 's in the 1930s , he mentioned to a member that he was looking for a better-paid job .
` I suppose , " he asked without any real hope , ` she did n't mention to you anything about anonymous letters ? "
` Anyway , we should be getting back upstairs , as you still have to change , " Nicky mentioned .
` The wine here is also very good , " he mentioned .
I mentioned I was doing a bit of surfing myself .
Stephen had not mentioned he was coming to Barbados .
In a duty report to my chief constable I mentioned I had written to Police Review .
Sue just happened to mention that she had been to an orphanage in Brasov and Christine realised it was the same one that Christine Morey had written about .
At the next meeting , Mr E almost casually mentioned that he had been trying out one or two of last week 's ideas and that Dave seemed quite responsive to him this week .
` In that connection , I might mention that Jesus Christ was evidently pretty au fait with micro-technology .
Later on when one boy inadvertently mentioned that ` amines smell of fish " everyone in hearing distance grabbed the nearest available paper bag .
You mentioned that there is follow up testing taking place .
